content: q1: what is aura-soma? - aura-soma is a unique holistic system that appeared at the end of the last century in great britain and is developing to this day. it includes color therapy, numerology, astrology, and the energy-spiritual wisdom of humanity.
q2: what is aura-soma’s mission? - aura-soma's mission is to promote cooperation among all beings in caring for each other and the earth that sustains us.

q3: what are aura-soma products? - aura-soma products are color-based wellness tools that blend botanical extracts, essential oils, crystals, and color vibrations to support personal well-being, self-discovery, and energetic balance through color therapy.

q4: what types of products do you offer? - we offer the following aura-soma range, including: - equilibrium bottles: dual-colored oil blends for intuitive self-selection and energy balance. - pomanders: fragrant aura sprays or drops designed for energetic protection and cleansing. - quintessences: aromatic sprays for meditation, inspiration, and higher awareness. - rescue set: pocket rescue equilibrium oils are your 'aura-soma® first aid' on the go in an emergency, crisis situation.

q5: what types of aura-soma services do you offer? - most of these services are available online or one-on-one consultation: - aura-soma id - express consultation (personal daily tip) - classic consultation - mega consultation - mandala reading - colorful forecasts on major world events (political, economic, etc.) - aura-soma year forecast - aura-soma retreat - more offers, courses, and b2b opportunities you may find at www.velana.net/aurasoma and www.velana.net/cooperation
q6: how can i book the aura-soma consultation? - you may book your consultation in one click: https://velana.net/aurasoma#offers
q7: are your products authentic? - yes - our products come directly from the aura-soma products ltd. (uk) factory and are guaranteed to be 100% authentic.
q8: where are aura-soma products made? - they are made in tetford, lincolnshire, uk.
q9: are aura-soma products organic? - aura-soma claims that its products are produced biodynamically and naturally, the aura-soma products are not organic/bio certified.
q10: are aura-soma products vegan? - no, aura-soma products are not vegan certified, and are not peta approved.

q11: are aura-soma products sustainable? - there is no certified information about it, as well as there are no recycling or other sustainable pictograms on aura-soma packaging. you can find more expert info about it on the linkedin company page 'velana'.
q12: how much do aura-soma products cost? - - equilibrium bottles: 47€ each. - pomanders, quintessence, and rescue bottle: 27€ each.
q13: what payment methods do you accept? - we accept: - stripe: major credit/debit cards (visa, mastercard, amex) - paypal - bank transfer (selected regions)

q14: do you offer discounts or bundles? - yes, apply via email to info@velana.net. we provide: - birthday discount code - bundle discounts of 3-5 products (e.g., discounted sets of pomanders) - seasonal sales and promotions
q15: do you ship internationally? - yes - you can buy products after your personal consultation. yes - shipping is available worldwide. rates and times vary by destination.
q16: how long does shipping take? - - local deliveries: 2–5 business days - international deliveries: typically 7–14 business days.
q17: do you provide tracking? - yes - you will receive a tracking number via email once your order ships.
q18: can i return aura-soma products? - opened or used items cannot be returned for health and safety reasons. however, unopened and unused items can be returned within 14 days of delivery.
q19: what if my product arrives damaged or defective? - contact us immediately with your order number and photos. we will replace or refund damaged items at no extra cost.

q20: how do i start a return? - email info@velana.net with your order details. we'll provide the return address and instructions. return shipping is the customer’s responsibility unless the item is defective or damaged.

express: €35 - express consultation gives you personalized know-how for a chosen day. - are you planning an important event? are you choosing a date for a wedding or business opening? curious to know the guidance of the aura-soma angels? then an express consultation is what you need!

classic: €100 - a classic aura-soma consultation reveals your unique gifts and mission. - reveals your unique gifts and mission of the spirit shows your past-present-future timeline helps you find answers to life situations revives inspiration and confidence on your path

mega: €130 - mega-consultation reveals all the sides and keys of aura-soma. - includes entire classic consultation determination of your individual equilibrium in aura-soma aura treatment with aura-soma pomander trends on your timeline how others see you practical tips on the path of destiny and much more
aura-soma 2025: €150 - get a colourful, inspiring, and most unusual year forecast for 2025. - main leitmotifs and description of 2025 with aura-soma products

mandala: €50 - personalised mandala reading for those who enjoy painting or coloring mandalas. - do you like to paint or color mandalas? want to know what stands behind your colours? get your personalised mandala reading

aura treatments: €20 - treatments to address negative emotions, stress, and other issues affecting aura quality. - addresses negative emotions, stress, harmful habits, diseases, unhealthy lifestyle counteracts collective electromagnetic spectrum and other life issues that lower aura vibrations and quality

welcome welcome welcome everybody so today i will tell you more about aura-soma system so here on the screen you can see the agenda and let's start from the first point the history of aura-soma and about vicky wall the appearance of aura-soma system is directly linked with the name of the famous english healer vicky wall created by her in the 80s of the 20th century the first collection of these multicolored bottles with an incredibly attractive power sparkling with the splendor of color and light was the result of amazing events of her life the starting point of which was vicky absolute faith and expertise which allowed her to understand the higher mind that speaks the language of
color and mother nature color is light without which our existence is unthinkable at all do you agree?

we perceive color of course naturally primarily through our vision through our eyes but subconsciously we absorb it through our skin and the entire being color being a wave in the physical sense penetrating into our body and causes certain biochemical reactions in tissues and stimulates important glands and normalizes and heals by influencing our body color can become its healer thus the science of color healing is called color therapy the best way to get to know vicky wall is to read her book the book calls the miracle of color healing following here are some facts from wiki's life vicky was the first female the fellow of the royal college of surgical pathology vicky was one of the

first to treat diabetes without insulin vicky's father was a special person he taught her how to understand herbs roots minerals plants and their medical use both vicky and her father they saw people's aura she began her training in the old school pharmacy where she put into practice the knowledge of plants she received from her father and later on vicky met margaret cockbain who had an osteopathi clinic and they became a partners organizing a medical center at 60 years old incredible fact this woman had a professional life rich in experience behind her which in one way or another way was always devoted to the health of people and caring for them and by this time

aura-soma arose vicky had to withdraw from active professional life due to progressive blindness and it seemed incredible that and it seemed incredible that at such elder age vicky created these colorful bottles and this is absolutely incredible that at such age with the progressing blindness this woman following her inner intuition created this product with sparkling colors indeed the intuitive development of aura-soma was the highest achievement of vicky wall and she herself saw her destiny in this she brought to aura-soma not only her rich personal and professional experience but also the knowledge about nature and its laws which her father told her about from early childhood and she gained later on at her professional practice in clinic the

transmitted knowledge was the beginning of a chain of significant and exciting events in her life having a variety of natural materials in her small laboratory one night driven by inspired intuition vicky began alchemical work the results of which was astonishing to herself already in the morning vickz and her friends could admire the wonderful appeared first bottles the contents of which were only liquids of different colors and shades and vicki had no answer to the question about the purpose of these bottles vicky not only had no idea about the capabilities of these substances but also did not know the significance of her discovery soon presenting her jewels that's how she called these bottles presented at various

exhibitions vicky began to receive more and more surprises from the people it turned out that the contents of the small bottles produce a much more significant effect than just cosmetics thanks to her innate gift of seeing the deep layers of people's aura vicky noted a very important observation for herself people first of all choose a bottle with the color in the so-called core of aua of an individual person in other words people choose a color that resonated with their colors and state of the aura thanks to this vision of the aura vicky was able to describe the broad effects of color therapy thus she derived the key thesis of aura we are the colors that

we choose and these colors reflect the true needs and essence of our inner being and agree with me it's impossible to formulate this effect more precisely color supports a person to trust the inner light the inner guidance and therefore now we come to mission and values of aura-soma mission and values of our system encourage people to their higher self to the better version of themselves also awakes importance and care of the planet ecology mission and values of aura-soma draw attention to the inner potential talents energy and realization of each of us because all followed the path of vicky wall followed the truths of light and color until the last days of her life after vicky

left the research work was continued by her assistant and friend mike booth today he is the principal of aura-soma academy in united kingdom the search for the secrets and truths of the world is still ongoing new pearls of the unique neckace of our continue to be born up to this day and this is an incredible and inexplicable feeling and blessing of belonging to this living stream today there are 122 equilibriums behind every bottle there is unique story so pick up your bottle at personal consultation and find your story color and light all products of aura-soma are organic and natural and they produced biodynamically aura-soma is non intrusive non interfering it self choice based holistic system it
speaks of the growth of consciousness, of bringing balance inner guidance, peace and understanding to all levels of our body mind spirit and senses.
it is a mean to help move towards positive being and personal growth towards auspicious changes on our planet, innovations and harmony for every being.

aura-soma combines the art of aroma therapy and herbal medicine through the use of herbal extracts and essential oils it combines the following three kingdoms the mineral kingdoms plant kingdoms and realms of color and light every aura-soma bottle combines these three realms the very concept of aura-soma means aura light soma means body in greek language or being on aramaic or life energy in sanskrit we can say therefore that aura-soma means light body light spirit therefore working with aura-soma products we develop our light body.

aura-soma we can say it's an old noble wine in a new form vicky said i searched and explored the depths of time nature innate wisdom and peace and i discovered something that existed but was long forgotten something that was to be born again in the new age in the new era the concept of aura-soma is closely related to light and color and it is a mirror of life.

light creates life and color creates vitality. without light lives goes away and without the color it becomes monotonous.a person's attitude towards light and color speaks about its own attitude towards life itself its mission richness abundance meaningfulness love and light
